game.title: Quest to the Sunstone
game.objective: Uncover the Sunstone's Power to Reunite the Kingdom
game.description: A great quest lies ahead as you must find the Sunstone, lost in the realm of Arvandor. Success brings wealth and honor.
game.reward: 500 gold coins, a mystical staff, and the gratitude of the people

task.description: Consult the ancient seer at the Whispering Glade for guidance on the Sunstone's location.

task.objective: Deliver the Moonbeard's Token to the Elven Council
task.description: Acquire the rare token from the elusive Moonbeard in the Northern Forest to gain their favor for the map.
Search the ancient ruins for a clue that will lead you to the Sunstone chamber.

task.objective: Defeat the Shadow Guardian at Nightfall Peak
task.description: Battle the dark force protecting the Sunstone during the lunar eclipse.

task.objective: Reclaim the Sunstone and Deliver to Queen Elara
task.description: Conquer the Shadow Guardian and return the Sunstone to its rightful place in the hands of our queen.
